method.name: Initialize
method.comment:
Initializes the object.
Pager - A fully initialized AHViewPager object.

method.name: RefreshTitles
method.comment: Refresh the titles of the tabs. Use this after changing a title in AHPageContainer.

method.name: NotifyDataChange
method.comment: Rebuilds the complete tabs data structure. You MUST call this after you add or remove a page from the AHViewPager.

property.name: Position
property.comment: Gets the current position in the tabs.

method.name: Initialize
method.comment:
Initializes the object.
Pager - A fully initialized AHViewPager object. Top - Flag if the indicator should be displayed on top or bottom of the ViewPager Height - The height of the indicator view.

method.name: Initialize
method.comment:
Initializes the object.
Pager - A fully initialized AHViewPager object. Top - Flag if the indicator should be displayed on top or bottom of the ViewPager Height - The height of the indicator view.

property.name: TabIndicatorColor
property.comment: Sets or gets the tab indicator color

property.name: DrawFullUnderline
property.comment: Sets or gets the flag if the text is undelined completely

class.name: de.amberhome.viewpager.AHViewPager
class.event: PageScrolled (Position As Int, PositionOffset as Float, PositionOffsetPixels as Int)
PageCreated (Position As Int, Page as Object)
PageDestroyed (Position As Int, Page as Object)

method.name: DesignerCreateView
method.comment: This method is only for the B4A Designer. Don't call it directly

method.name: GotoPage
method.comment: Jump or Scroll to the new page Page - The new page to display Smooth - True to smoothly scroll to the new item, false to transition immediately

method.name: Initialize
method.comment:
Initializes the object.
pages EventName - Sets the sub that will handle the event.

method.name: SetLayout
method.comment: Changes the View position and size.

method.name: SetVisibleAnimated
method.comment: Fade the view in or out

method.name: Invalidate3
method.comment: Invalidate part of the object

method.name: Invalidate2
method.comment: Invalidate a rectangualar part of the object

method.name: SetColorAnimated
method.comment: Animate the color to a new value

method.name: Initialize2
method.comment:
Initializes the object.
Layout - A fully initialized AHPagerLayout object with the content of the pages EventName - Sets the sub that will handle the event.

method.name: SetLayoutAnimated
method.comment:
Similar to SetLayout. Animates the change. Note that the animation will only be applied when running on Android 3+ devices.
Duration - duration of the layout change

property.name: Left
property.comment: Gets or sets the view's left position

property.name: Top
property.comment: Gets or sets the view's top position

property.name: CurrentPage
property.comment: Get or Set the current page

property.name: PagingEnabled
property.comment: Enables or disables the paging of the ViewPager.

property.name: Height
property.comment: Gets or sets the view's height

property.name: Width
property.comment: Gets or sets the view's width

property.name: OffscreenPageLimit
property.comment:
Set the number of pages that should be retained to either side of the current page in the view hierarchy in an idle state. Pages beyond this limit will be recreated from the adapter when needed.
This is offered as an optimization. If you know in advance the number of pages you will need to support or have lazy-loading mechanisms in place on your pages, tweaking this setting can have benefits in perceived smoothness of paging animations and interaction. If you have a small number of pages (3-4) that you can keep active all at once, less time will be spent in layout for newly created view subtrees as the user pages back and forth.
You should keep this limit low, especially if your pages have complex layouts. This setting defaults to 1.

class.name: de.amberhome.viewpager.AHPageContainer
class.comment: AHPagerLayout holds the layout of the pages

method.name: DeletePage
method.comment: Deletes the specified page. Position - Page to be deleted

method.name: GetPageObject
method.comment: Returns the View added as a page. Normally this is a Panel object. Position - Index of the object

method.name: SetTitle
method.comment:
Sets the title of the page.
Title - The new title text. Position - Position of the title to change.

method.name: AddPageAt
method.comment: Add a new page to the pager layout at the specified position. Normally you will provide a Panel here. View - The view to be added as a new page Title - The title of the new page Position - Position where the new page will be added

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initializes the object

method.name: GetTitle
method.comment:
Gets the title of the page.
Position - Position of the title to get.

method.name: AddPage
method.comment: Add a new page to the pager layout. Normally you will provide a Panel here. View - The view to be added as a new page Title - The title of the new page

method.name: SetContent
method.comment:
Sets the pages and titles for the container
Pages - A List or Array of Panel objects Titles - A List or Array of page titles

property.name: Pages
property.comment: The List or Array of the pages.

property.name: Count
property.comment: Gets the number of pages in the layout.

property.name: Titles
property.comment: The List or Array of the titles.

method.name: Initialize
method.comment:
Initializes the object.
Pager - A fully initialized AHViewPager object.

method.name: RefreshTitles
method.comment: Refresh the titles of the tabs. Use this after changing a title in AHPageContainer.

method.name: NotifyDataChange
method.comment: Rebuilds the complete tabs data structure. You MUST call this after you add or remove a page from the AHViewPager.

property.name: TextSize
property.comment: Gets the current position in the tabs.

root.comment: This library provides objects to implement a CustomViewPager.
root.author: Markus Stipp
